user.description:
Before setup, the device must be connected to your local network.

Supported models:
- New Open API (RPC): R11, R21, P11S, EM06P, EM16P
- Legacy LAN: R10, EM06, EM16

For more information, please refer to 'Help'.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of the Refoss device to connect to.

reconfigure.description:
Update configuration for {device_name}.

Before setup, devices must be connected to the network.

abort.another_device: Re-configuration was unsuccessful, the IP address/hostname of another Refoss device was used.

error.no_devices_found: No devices found on the network, Please check if the IP address is correct
error.firmware_not_fully_supported: Device not fully supported. Please contact Refoss support
